Patients stratify location metastatic site ( visceral bone v nonvisceral lung ) number metastatic site ( 1 vs 2 v 3 ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive allogenic melanoma cell lysate vaccine detoxify endotoxin subcutaneously ( SQ ) weekly week 1-5 8-12 . Interferon alfa ( IFN-A ) SQ administer three time week begin week 4 .
